page.title: 03Mollington Buildings Part 1
page.content: There are some notable Saxon Farm buildings{(Poplars Farmhouse,The {Forge,The Manor,Chestnuts {Farmhouse)}which were occupied during the Cromwellian Battle of Edge Hill. Several properties are converted from previous "commercial"roles, indicate the changing nature of the village. The{Old School House}now a private house since the new school was built in 1978,to cater for the growing population. The{Bakery}now a private house as it could no longer maintain a viable local trading level. However there are some old cottages on{THE ROW}occupied by some of the originals in the Village,having lived here for 70 years and never leaving the security of the village boundary.
